page.title: 15HEALEY MILLS GOOD YARD
page.content: {Healey Mills Goods Yard}is the biggest goods yard in the area. It has two{snow ploughs.} Their colours are yellow and black. There are no {steam locomotives.}The{goods}come into the yard and{shunters}shunt them into the right places. You cannot go into the yard, but there is a path along the edge for the{public}to walk on. At one end of the yard there is some {dismantling}and a pile of{rails}which are{disused.} The men who work in the yard wear blue suits. In the yard there are six sets of {lights}which are like{floodlights}at a football ground, but much bigger. There is a{building}which the men work from and a car park for them to park their cars.
